2.1.hd_quote: Our direction is about trying to find the most beautiful way.
2.1.behavioral_axis: Moves toward beauty and harmony as direction unfolds naturally, seeking aesthetic alignment in life's trajectory.
2.1.shadow_axis: Tries to control direction through willpower and ego, ignoring innate wisdom and creating disharmony.
2.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

2.2.hd_quote: Unconscious and unlearnable alignment of stimulus and response.
2.2.behavioral_axis: Naturally moves in the right direction without knowing it, called out by others who see the way from outside.
2.2.shadow_axis: Claims knowledge is power when recognized, letting ego distort natural direction into madness.
2.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

2.3.hd_quote: The teacher that never stops being a student.
2.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments with different directions through trial and error, breaking bonds to try new mutations until finding what works.
2.3.shadow_axis: Demands immediate expression without patience, either rigidly fixing on one direction or jumping rapidly between many.
2.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

2.4.hd_quote: The ability to preserve harmony through discretion.
2.4.behavioral_axis: Externalizes direction quietly without announcing it beforehand, preserving harmony through strategic secrecy.
2.4.shadow_axis: Announces direction prematurely with loose lips, letting ego claim ownership and creating enmity through interference.
2.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

2.5.behavioral_axis: Receives projections from others about knowing the way, strategically manages resources and fuel from those who recognize the direction.
2.5.shadow_axis: Refuses to share responsibility or recognize others' abilities, hoarding direction selfishly when projections turn negative.
2.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

2.6.hd_quote: Unable or unwilling to see the whole picture.
2.6.behavioral_axis: Sits on the roof seeking perspective, selective and narrow in receptivity about which mutations to embrace for the totality.
2.6.shadow_axis: Gets fixed on mundane security concerns, distorting awareness destructively and missing mutative opportunities in life.
2.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
